title: Espanso text expander YAML schema
description: The Schema for text expansions for the open source program Espanso (https://Espanso.org)

trigger.description: A field of either string or Array type, this is the text you type in order to trigger Espanso's text replacement.

label.description: A string field to override the default description of a text replacement, making the search UI of Espanso more intuitive.

word.description: A boolean field turning on and off setting that tells Espanso to only trigger that match if surrounded by word separators ( such as spaces, commas and newlines)

propagate_case.description: A boolean field turning on and off case-propagation, which makes it possible to expand a match preserving the trigger casing.
